name: Redwell Primary School
trainWithUs:
5 Wells work collaboratively with schools enabling us to offer a broad variety of experience to our Apprentices.

High quality, value for money whole school training is at the core of our offer.
trainWithDisability: We aim to be inclusive in our practice and welcome applications from everyone. We can offer support both at interview stage and once students have enrolled. London Metropolitan University has a dedicated service to support students with disabilities, long-term medical or mental health conditions or Specific Learning Difficulties (SpLDs) such as dyslexia.
